etymology.description: 彭 (surname) + 丽媛 (given name) = the personal name “Peng Liyuan.”
etymology.interpretation: Refers to Peng Liyuan, a prominent Chinese soprano and public figure; the given name evokes beauty and elegance.
etymology.simplification: 麗 was simplified to 丽 to reduce strokes; 彭 and 媛 are unchanged.

parts.english: beautiful and graceful; elegant lady; feminine beauty

examples.chinese: 彭丽媛是著名的女高音歌唱家(彭麗媛是著名的女高音歌唱家)。
examples.pinyin: Péng Lìyuán shì zhùmíng de nǚgāoyīn gēchàngjiā.
examples.english: Peng Liyuan is a renowned soprano singer.

examples.chinese: 她在重要场合演唱过多次(她在重要場合演唱過多次)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zài zhòngyào chǎnghé yǎnchàng guò duō cì.
examples.english: She has performed many times at important occasions.

examples.chinese: 作为公众人物(作為公眾人物)，她也从事文化交流(她也從事文化交流)。
examples.pinyin: Zuòwéi gōngzhòng rénwù, tā yě cóngshì wénhuà jiāoliú.
examples.english: As a public figure, she also engages in cultural exchange.
